item.title: Release notes from neovim: Nvim development (prerelease) build
item.content:encoded:
NVIM v0.7.0-dev+792-gc46f7caad
Build type: RelWithDebInfo
LuaJIT 2.1.0-beta3

Install

Windows

  1. Extract nvim-win64.zip
  2. Run nvim-qt.exe

macOS

  1. Download nvim-macos.tar.gz
  2. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-macos.tar.gz
  3. Run ./nvim-osx64/bin/nvim

Linux (x64)

  1. Download nvim.appimage
  2. Run chmod u+x nvim.appimage && ./nvim.appimage
    • If your system does not have FUSE you can extract the appimage: 
      ./nvim.appimage --appimage-extract
./squashfs-root/usr/bin/nvim

Other

  • Install by package manager

SHA256 Checksums

689872769aa2cfbb409dd2a6fbe025a700f9b2ae56ce9ab39c0de36967dd05c9  nvim-linux64.tar.gz
f9faa2fc2214ab0484105538043f8109f9a895471eaa8ae9285a04574f351045  nvim.appimage
542a8c8b36d7452abb97b6cbd62c744abc1c3855d40d7f013eb824cb40249a95  nvim.appimage.zsync
a99d20f488f714bf51a56719b0ff8f7cbc0ff01f951f5b782ad6d28df33e6258  nvim-macos.tar.gz
6372da64ee24ed21bac0c8bdf0aa82bb2bf659b853f9b0663669a081ded89617  nvim-win64.zip

item.title: Release notes from altair: Version 4.2.0
item.content:encoded:
• Update Vega-Lite from version 4.8.1 to version 4.17.0; see Vega-Lite Release Notes.

Enhancements

  • Pie charts are now supported through the use of mark_arc. (Examples: eg. Pie Chart and Radial Chart)
  • Support for the datum encoding specifications from Vega-Lite; see Vega-Lite Datum Definition. (Examples: Line Chart with datum and Line Chart with datum for color.)
  • angle encoding can now be used to control point styles (Example: Wind Vector Map)
  • Support for serialising pandas nullable data types for float data (#2399).
  • Automatically create an empty data object when Chart is called without a data parameter (#2515).
  • Allow the use of pathlib Paths when saving charts (#2355).
  • Support deepcopy for charts (#2403).

Bug Fixes

  • Fix to_dict() for nested selections (#2120).
  • Fix item access for expressions (#2099).

item.title: Release notes from swc: v1.2.124: fix(es/renamer): Fix renamer (#3139)
item.content:encoded:
fix(es/renamer): Fix renamer (#3139)

swc_ecma_transforms_base:
- `resolver`: Ignore named export with source.
- `hygiene`: Ignore named export with source. (Closes #2924, Closes #3114)

swc_ecma_minifier:
- Handle `export default` declarations as declaration instead of expressions. (Closes #2717)
- Don't override already-processed identifiers. (Closes #2988)

swc_bundler:
- Adjust the syntax context for named re-exports.

item.title: Release notes from swr: 1.2.0-beta.0
item.content:encoded:
Highlights of This Release

Dedicated API for Optimistic Updates with Auto Rollback on Error

There are now some new options in mutate:

mutate(patchUser(user), {
  revalidate: true,
  populateCache: true,
  rollbackOnError: true,
  optimisticData: user,
})

Here the cache will be immediately updated to user (optimistic value), and then a request (mutation) is started via patchUser(user) and the result will be written to the cache. If that mutation fails, the original result will be rolled back safely. And after all those finishes, a revalidation will start to fetch the latest value.

You can do the same for the global mutate, just remember to pass the key.

Here's an example: https://codesandbox.io/s/swr-basic-forked-k5hps.

What's Changed

  • feat: Optimistic mutation with error rollback by @shuding in #1745
  • chore: Ignore coverage report by @shuding in #1744
  • chore: Merge mutation states by @shuding in #1748
  • chore: Rename CONCURRENT_REQUESTS to FETCH by @shuding in #1749
  • Merge extra request states in cache by @shuding in #1752

Full Changelog: 1.1.2...1.2.0-beta.0

item.title: Release notes from ember.js: v4.1.0
item.content:encoded:
CHANGELOG

  • #19772 / #19826 [FEATURE] Add a @cached decorator per RFC #0566.
  • #19471 / #19834 [FEATURE] Add refresh method to the Router Service per RFC #0631.
  • #19776 [FEATURE] Provide service export from @ember/service in favour of inject implementing RFC #0752.
  • #19510 [DEPRECATION] Deprecate auto location per RFC #0711.
  • #17570 [BUGFIX] Passing ObjectProxy with a property size to isEmpty would throw assertion
  • #18269 [BUGFIX] Fix for when query params are using a nested value

item.title: Release notes from swagger-codegen: Swagger Codegen 3.0.31 has been released!
item.content:encoded:
3.0.31 release of swagger-codegen with OpenAPI 3 support.

See also https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen-generators/releases/tag/v1.0.31

What's Changed

  • allow full url in php option by @gracekarina in #11271
  • fix docker user for JETTY_BASE dir by @frantuma in #11284
  • bump slf4j version to fix possible vulnerability by @philipplewe in #11289
  • don't overwrite already existing property useOas2 by @sleicht in #10880
  • Codegen generators issue 966 by @HugoMario in #11299
  • updated java client samples by @HugoMario in #11301
  • updated spring samples by @HugoMario in #11308
  • bump logback to 1.2.9 by @frantuma in #11313

New Contributors

  • @sleicht made their first contribution in #10880

Full Changelog: v3.0.30...v3.0.31

Supported V3 generators

  • typescript-axios (experimental)

  • go (experimental)

  • typescript-fetch (experimental)

  • r (experimental)

  • swift5 (experimental)

  • javascript (experimental)

  • micronaut (experimental)

  • go-server (experimental)

  • akka-scala (experimental)

  • nodejs (updated)

  • dynamic-html

  • html

  • html2

  • java

  • jaxrs-cxf-client

  • jaxrs-cxf

  • inflector

  • jaxrs-cxf-cdi

  • jaxrs-spec

  • jaxrs-jersey

  • jaxrs-di

  • jaxrs-resteasy-eap

  • jaxrs-resteasy

  • spring

  • openapi

  • openapi-yaml

  • kotlin-client

  • kotlin-server

  • php

  • swift3

  • swift4

  • typescript-angular

  • scala

  • aspnetcore

  • csharp

  • csharp-dotnet2 (DEPRECATED)

  • python

  • python-flask (experimental)

item.title: Release notes from serverless: 2.70.0 (2021-12-27)
item.content:encoded:
Features

  • AWS API Gateway: Allow use of custom authorizer with authorizerId (#10384) (c0eda27) (Adam Lanners)
  • AWS Local Invocation: Upgrade log4j to version 2.17.0 (#10396) (2782ed4) (Vassili Gorshkov)

Bug Fixes

  • AWS API Gateway: Meaningfully reject missing restApiRootResourceId (#10371) (2c0a962) (Sudipto Das)
  • AWS Deploy: Fix reliability of VPC config change detection in deploy function (#10409) (0190d0d) (Piotr Grzesik)

Templates

  • Upgrade log4j in aws-lambda-java-log4j2 (#10383) (786f5e4) (Marina)
  • Upgrade log4j in aws-kotlin-jvm-gradle (#10382) (7bf8f1b) (Varun)
  • Upgrade log4j dependencies (#10392) (86fa604) (Juan Berm√∫dez)

Maintenance Improvements

  • Telemetry:
    • Report didCreateService property (#10406) (4fa20a5) (Piotr Grzesik)
    • Report projectId in remove command (#10415) (0de3bc3) (Piotr Grzesik)
    • Ensure to report projectId for interactive (#10406) (08b5acb) (Piotr Grzesik)
  • CLI: Replace internal old logging utils with modern interface (#10417) (5a451ad) (Mariusz Nowak)
  • Variables: Support custom sources in internal resolver (#10393) (365a7f1) (Mariusz Nowak)

Comparison since last release

item.title: Release notes from osquery: 5.1.0
item.content:encoded:
Git Commits

Representing commits from 20 contributors! Thank you all.

Note: The linux .tar.gz includes debugging symbols. This may be larger than you expect

New Features

  • Allow custom cpu limit duration for the watchdog (#7348)
  • Support custom endpoints for AWS Kinesis and Firehose. (#7317)

Table Changes

  • Add docker_container_envs table for access to docker container environment (#7313)
  • curl table now returns peer certificates even if the TLS handshake does not complete (#7349)

Under the Hood improvements

  • Allow tests and SDK to reset dispatcher state (#7372)
  • Avoid string copies when looping through cron search dirs (#7331)
  • Respect read_max flag when hashing using ssdeep (#7367)

Bug Fixes

  • Detect when an extension has not started correctly on Windows (#7355)
  • Fix crash #7353 when osquery captures kill syscall when not subscribed to them (#7354)
  • Fix crash in AuditdNetlinkReader::configureAuditService when audit_add_rule_data returns an error (#7337)
  • Fix crash when windows_security_products errors out (#7401)
  • Fix for #7394 where cleanup of some event tables never occures (#7395)
  • Improve BPF publisher reliability (#7302)
  • Lower log level of "executing distributed query" (#7386)
  • Reduce excessive log messages from authorized_keys table implementation (#7318)

Documentation

  • Add 5.0.1 CHANGELOG (#7284)
  • Fix typo in Everything in SQL docs (#7338)
  • Fix typo in SQL docs (#7376)
  • Update GitHub issue templates (#7361, #7396)
  • Update installation guide to use newer macOS paths (#7311)
  • Update macOS ESF documentation (#7303)

Packs

  • Add Forcepoint Endpoint Chrome Extension detection to packs (#7346)
  • Add beurk rootkit detection to packs (#7345)

Build

  • Allow tests to reset the restarting state (#7373)
  • Build librpm with ndb support (#7294)
  • Customizable installation logic (#7315)
  • Fix ASL test on macOS 11 and later (#7320)
  • Restore query packs in Windows packaging (#7388)
  • Skip deprecated ASL test when targeting macOS 10.13+ SDK (#7358)
  • Update packaging commit to fix Linux symlinks (#7404)
  • Update the CI Linux Docker image (#7332)

item.title: Release notes from ant-design: 4.18.0
item.content:encoded:
• üêû Fix Skeleton missing style prop. #33405
  • üêû Fix Descriptions overflow style cause other components being cut. #33392
  • üÜï Unique Select-like component generic as OptionType to support FieldNames type. #33364
  • üêû Fix Slider rail hover color when it is disabled. #33369 @chen-jingjie
  • Table
    • üÜï Table colSpan & rowSpan move to onCell function to optimize performance. #33114
    • üÜï Table support Table.EXPAND_COLUMN & Table.SELECTION_COLUMN to customize column order. #33026
  • Form
    • üî• Form.List nest Form.Item no longer need pass fieldKey anymore. #32689
    • üÜï Form label can wrap via setting labelWrap now. #33048
  • üÜï ConfigProvider support Form colon. 9bc148a @seaSuper
  • üÜï add prefix to InputNumber. #32600 @Austaras
  • üÜï Modal static function support wrapClassName prop. #32676 @cwjTerrace
  • üÜï Popconfirm add showCancel prop. #32620 @cwjTerrace
  • üÜï Dropdown.Button supports loading property now. #32467 @kaysonwu
  • üÜï Input adds showCount property. #32522 @cwjTerrace
  • üÜï Alert supports closeIcon now. #32345 @chen-jingjie
  • Typography
    • üÜï for editable Paragraph, edit can be triggered by clicking the icon or the value itself (or both) with triggerType. #32219 @kachanovskiy
    • üÜï Typography support enterIcon to config confirm icon. #32220 @kachanovskiy
  • üÜï Divider added orientationMargin APIs for customizing margin-left/right of title. #32084 @neotan
  • üÜï Avatar add maxPopoverTrigger to support configuration of popover trigger. #32197 @RiteshMakan
  • üÜï Upload supports showUploadList.previewIcon now. #32059 @1040961807
  • üè¥Û†Å•Û†Å≥Û†Å£Û†Å¥Û†Åø Fix Catalan (ca_ES) missing translation key with Form. #33377 @ZzGGitter
  • üá´üáÆ Fix Finland (fi_FI) missing translation key with Table. #33372 @ZakarFin
  • üá∞üá≠ Added locales for Khmer (km_KH) translation. #32853 @vireakkeosokvibol
  • TypeScript
    • ü§ñ Add Upload capture definition. #33370 @MichalPodeszwa
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Skeleton ‰∏çÊîØÊåÅ style ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#33405

  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Slider Á¶ÅÁî®Êó∂ hover Ëâ≤ÂΩ©ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#33369 @chen-jingjie
  • Table
    • üÜï Table colSpan ‰∏é rowSpan ËøÅÁßªËá≥ onCell ÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏≠Ôºå‰ª•‰ºòÂåñÊ∏≤ÊüìÊÄßËÉΩ„ÄÇ#33114

  • Form

    • üÜï Form Áé∞Âú®ÊîØÊåÅÈÄöËøá labelWrap ÂºÄÂêØÊ†áÁ≠æÂèØÊç¢Ë°å„ÄÇ#33048
  • üÜï ConfigProvider ÊîØÊåÅ Form ÁöÑ colon ÈÖçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ9bc148a @seaSuper

  • Typography
    • üÜï ÂØπ‰∫éÂèØÁºñËæëÊÆµËêΩÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÈÖçÁΩÆ triggerType ÈÖçÁΩÆËß¶ÂèëÁºñËæëÁä∂ÊÄÅ„ÄÇ#32219 @kachanovskiy

  • üÜï Upload Êñ∞Â¢û showUploadList.previewIcon Áî®‰∫éËá™ÂÆö‰πâÈ¢ÑËßàÂõæÊ†á„ÄÇ#32059 @1040961807
  • üè¥Û†Å•Û†Å≥Û†Å£Û†Å¥Û†Åø ‰øÆÂ§çÂä†Ê≥∞ÁΩóÂ∞º‰∫öËØ≠ (ca_ES) ÂØπ Form Áº∫Â§±ÁøªËØëÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#33377 @ZzGGitter
  • üá´üáÆ ‰øÆÂ§çËä¨ÂÖ∞ËØ≠ (fi_FI) ÂØπ Table ÁöÑÁº∫Â§±ÁøªËØëÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#33372 @ZakarFin
  • üá∞üá≠ Êñ∞Â¢ûÈ´òÊ£âËØ≠ (km_KH) ËØ≠Ë®ÄÂåÖ„ÄÇ#32853 @vireakkeosokvibol
  • TypeScript
    • ü§ñ Ê∑ªÂä† Upload capture ÂÆö‰πâ„ÄÇ#33370 @MichalPodeszwa
